Commentary: Anwar Ali to Gayle, FOUR, what a start for Gayle. But he gets a terrible ball, must be said. Low full toss outside off, Gayle drives it in the gap at cover for four. Did not have to do much to get Lahore off and running
Anwar Ali to Gayle, no run, better from Anwar. Full on off, Gayle defends into the cover region. Not a good length when Gayle is teeing off though
Anwar Ali to Gayle, no run, crashed to cover. Phew, that flew. Very full outside off, Gayle creams a drive straight to the fielder
Anwar Ali to Gayle, no run, slower ball on off, that spun. Gayle pats it to the off side
Anwar Ali to Gayle, 1 run, outside edge to third man. Bowls this on a back of a length outside off and Gayle tries to punch through cover
Anwar Ali to Azhar Ali, 1 run, too straight and tucked off his pads to deep square leg to get off the mark
Umar Gul to Azhar Ali, no run, nips back in from a good length to hit Azhar high on the thigh pad. Good start
Umar Gul to Azhar Ali, no run, loses his shape a touch. Full outside off, Azhar comes down looking for a big heave. A crunchy drive finds mid-off
Umar Gul to Azhar Ali, 1 run, length on off, worked off his pads to square leg
Umar Gul to Gayle, 2 runs, pierces the gap at extra cover for a brace. Good shot, did not look to hit it too hard. Stayed on the back foot and punched the back of the length delivery
Umar Gul to Gayle, no run, nice from Umar. Full delivery outside off, but Gayle is beaten by a bit of away movement

Umar Gul to Gayle, FOUR, poor ball. Giving Gayle a few freebies to start isn't a very clever idea. Low full toss outside off, Gayle leans on the drive and finds the gap through cover for four. Two free boundaries for Gayle
Anwar Ali to Azhar Ali, 1 run, nice batting. Shuffles across to the back of the length delivery to tuck to backward square leg. Intent was one all along
Anwar Ali to Gayle, no run, 132 kph. Full on middle, Gayle drives exquisitely but finds cover.

Anwar Ali to Gayle, SIX, the boundaries have been brought in today, but to Gayle, I don't think it matters at all. Slower offcutter outside off, but right in the slot. Gayle stays in his crease and lofts the drive easily over mid-off. sailing into the stands
Anwar Ali to Gayle, no run, back of a length outside off, chopped to mid-off. Played that too early

Anwar Ali to Gayle, SIX, making it look easy. Anwar dishes out a very similar delivery to the previous hit. Slower delivery outside off, width for Gayle to throw his hands at it and clear the long-off boundary by about 15 metres. Easy

Anwar Ali to Gayle, no run, good change in length but that hardly surprised Gayle, who I'd suspect was anticipating that after the full stuff. Bouncer outside off, rises steeply and beats the pull of Gayle. Good hustling delivery
Umar Gul to Azhar Ali, 1 run, excellent stuff from Azhar. Guides the dab to third man off the open face. On to you, CG

Umar Gul to Gayle, SIX, oh, my. 1560-metre hit that. Wow. Good length on off, Gayle stays back and clobbers the pull way over the midwicket boundary. Absolutely humongous that. Gayle looking dangerous
Umar Gul to Gayle, no run, not anticipating that length, there. Full on leg, in the slot again. Hits Gayle on the pad and then to short third man.
Umar Gul to Gayle, no run, good delivery that. Bouncer angled away from Gayle who decides to leave. Nice change up
Umar Gul to Gayle, no run, yikes. More than a friendly full toss on leg from Gul from around the wicket. Gayle somehow fails to connect. Struck on the pad. Sliding down leg
Umar Gul to Gayle, 1 run, excellent from Gul. Speared in the blockhole on leg, jammed out by Gayle to midwicket
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, 1 run, tossed up on off, driven to long-off with the spin
Zulfiqar Babar to Gayle, SIX, 'twas always going to be an iffy decision. Flat on leg and Gayle just helps it over the square leg boundary. Easy for Gayle.
Zulfiqar Babar to Gayle, SIX, another six. Low full toss on middle, Gayle wallops it over midwicket. Six more, clears the brought-in boundary by a few metres
Zulfiqar Babar to Gayle, 1 run, absolutely smashed to midwicket. In the slot again. Not great bowling and captaincy
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, no run, flight on middle, blocked
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, 1 run, decent stroke, but Azhar keeps strike. Gets down early to crash the sweep to square leg.
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, FOUR, scythed in the gap past third man. Short and wide, Azhar forces the cut in the gap. Not quite where he wanted but four.
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, no run, tossed up outside off, Azhar is way too early into his sweep and misses. Struck on the body
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, FOUR, superb batting. Picked his spot and executed beautifully. Got down early, pummeled the sweep to the square leg boundary
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, 1 run, very full on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on for a quick run. Good batting
Mohammad Nabi to Gayle, no run, nice, spin. Tossed up outside off, Gayle comes forward and prods. The spin takes it past the outside edge
Mohammad Nabi to Gayle, 1 run, good run, turns the length delivery to short fine leg for a hurried run.
Elliott to Gayle, 1 run, full and wide from Elliott. Good line. Slashed to point who fumbles to allow the extra run
Elliott to Azhar Ali, no run, short down leg, in the slot again but it pings off Azhar's pads to fine leg
Elliott to Azhar Ali, 1 run, offcutter on leg, worked to deep midwicket
Elliott to Gayle, 1 run, punched to long-off. Back of a length from Elliott
Elliott to Azhar Ali, no run, good length on off, pushed back to the bowler. Good tight line
Elliott to Azhar Ali, no run, slower delivery outside off, Azhar comes down to slash a cut but cannot connect. Great over
Mohammad Nabi to Gayle, 1 run, great fielding by cover. Miscommunication. hesitation. Good length on off, punched to cover who fields well to cause the confusion. A single is completed
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, SIX, nicely done from Azhar. Showed intent to the right-hander. Comes down and lofts the heave over midwicket. Just about clears the boundary
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, FOUR, clears short fine leg for four. Gets down early and top-edges the sweep over short fine leg
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, no run, low full toss, fired down leg. Tickled down to short fine leg
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, 1 run, slower but flat on middle, nudged to square leg
Mohammad Nabi to Gayle, no run, nicely bowled. Wider of the crease outside off, Gayle defends to point
Elliott to Azhar Ali, FOUR, shot. Slashed in the gap through backward point for a boundary. Played that really nicely. Guided it to the boundary
Elliott to Azhar Ali, 1 run, offcutter on leg, clipped to deep midwicket
Elliott to Gayle, FOUR, drilled for fifty. Overpitched outside off, Gayle stays in the crease and powers the drive past cover. Whistles away for four.
Elliott to Gayle, no run, full on off, tamely pushed to cover
Elliott to Gayle, 1 run, wide of the crease. Fullish length on off, tapped to cover for a quick run
Elliott to Azhar Ali, 1 run, worked away to midwicket for an easy run
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, SIX, wow, shot. Clears his front foot, and then launches one over midwikcet. Made a good sound off the bat. Six more to the brought-in boundary
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, no run, full on off, drilled to cover
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, no run, yorker fired in on middle and leg, stabbed back
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, FOUR, beautiful batting from Azhar. he is putting on a show of his own. Gets down early and this time paddles the reverse sweep past short third man. Runs leaking
Mohammad Nabi to Azhar Ali, 1 run, good length on off, pushed to cover
Mohammad Nabi to Gayle, 1 run, quick single. Full on off, patted to cover for another quick single
Zulfiqar Babar to Gayle, 1 run, low full toss on middle, drilled away to midwicket. Hit it uppishly, just short of midwicket who fumbles the awkward bounce
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, 1 run, short on middle, Azhar backs away and cuts a straight delivery to the sweeper.
Zulfiqar Babar to Gayle, SIX, this is just poor captaincy. Babar bowls a low full on middle and with a short boundary, it was always going to be a speculative call. Whacked over long-off

Zulfiqar Babar to Gayle, OUT, gone. Unbelievable. Full toss on off, deserved to be smashed again and Gayle hits it alright, but straight down the throat to long-on. Against the run-of-play. Loose delivery, Babar not only gets away with it, but removes the boss.
Wicket: ['CH Gayle c Ahmed Shehzad b Zulfiqar Babar 60 (34b 3x4 6x6) SR: 176.47']

Commentary: Zulfiqar Babar to Umar Akmal, 1 run, clips the full delivery to square leg
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, 1 run, another full toss on middle, nurdled to deep midwicket. 10 of the over.
Mohammad Nawaz to Azhar Ali, 1 run, flat on middle, tucked to deep midwicket
Mohammad Nawaz to Umar Akmal, 1 run, flat on middle, Akmal goes deep to push to midwicket. Keeping the strike rotating
Mohammad Nawaz to Azhar Ali, 1 run, full outside off, Azhar sweeps awkwardly to midwicket
Mohammad Nawaz to Umar Akmal, 1 run, pushed to the sweeper cover.
Mohammad Nawaz to Azhar Ali, 1 run, short outside off, pulled to long-on
Mohammad Nawaz to Umar Akmal, 1 run, another single. Pushed to long-off. Six singles of the over.
Zulfiqar Babar to Umar Akmal, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, played away to square leg
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, no run, yorker on off, squeezed back to the bowler
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, no run, full on middle, whacked back to Babar
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, FOUR, smashed past cover for four. Azhar gets to fifty as well. Gives himself room and finds the gap. Important boundary
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, 1 run, low full toss outside off, muscled to the sweeper cover
Zulfiqar Babar to Umar Akmal, no run, darted in outside off, steered to short third man
Mohammad Nawaz to Azhar Ali, no run, flat on off, driven to cover
Mohammad Nawaz to Azhar Ali, 1 run, tossed up on middle and leg, wristily driven to long-on
Mohammad Nawaz to Umar Akmal, no run, flat, outside off, Akmal looks to slash but misses
Mohammad Nawaz to Umar Akmal, 1 run, tossed up on middle, slogged to square leg. Losing a bit of momentum here are Lahore
Mohammad Nawaz to Azhar Ali, no run, flat outside off, Azhar misses his attempted drive.
Mohammad Nawaz to Azhar Ali, 1 run, fired in on off, whacked to long-on. Great over, just three of it and Lahore are failing to find the boundary
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, FOUR, tossed up on off, Azhar comes down the pitch and thrashes the drive past cover. Long-off runs around but fails to keep it in
Zulfiqar Babar to Azhar Ali, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, slapped to long-on for a run
Zulfiqar Babar to Umar Akmal, FOUR, full toss outside off. Not great bowling. Akmal scythes the guide in the gap at point for four.
Zulfiqar Babar to Umar Akmal, 2 runs, nurdled off his pads in the gap in front of midwicket. Played with soft hands and that earned him two

Zulfiqar Babar to Umar Akmal, FOUR, another full toss on middle and leg, just clipped in the gap at deep midwicket. Looked like a run or two at best, but the timing tookm it whistling to the boundary. Superlative
Zulfiqar Babar to Umar Akmal, 1 run, yet another of those full tosses, drilled to long-on
Elliott to Umar Akmal, 1 run, slower ball on off, guided to third man

Elliott to Azhar Ali, OUT, out. Gone. Offcutter on off, Azhar goes to slog it away into the leg side and hits it well. But doesn't get enough elevation. The heave finds deep midwicket. Great innings from Azhar, has set up a really strong foundation for his team
Elliott to Umar Akmal, 1 run, length on middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
Wicket: ['Azhar Ali c Anwar Ali b Elliott 61 (45b 7x4 2x6) SR: 135.55']

Commentary: Elliott to Bravo, no run, legcutter outside off, punched back to the bowler
Elliott to Bravo, 1 run, outside off and steered to point.
Elliott to Umar Akmal, no run, short and wide outside off, Akmal misses his cut. Impressive over, just three of it.
Anwar Ali to Bravo, FOUR, good length on off, Bravo lifts the ball over mid-off. Knew the field and picked his spot excellently
Anwar Ali to Bravo, 1 run, full and wide outside off, Bravo looks to go over cover but gets a thick outside edge which is cleaned up by third man
Anwar Ali to Umar Akmal, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, pushed down to long-off for one. Akmal needs to go for more, I feel.
Anwar Ali to Bravo, 1 run, slower ball outside off, guided to short third man who does well. Elliott the man

Anwar Ali to Umar Akmal, FOUR, short on middle and leg, Akmal pulls in the air but short of the rushing square leg fielder. Bounces awkwardly in front of Nabi who went for the catch, but conceded the boundary in the process
Anwar Ali to Umar Akmal, SIX, there it is. good hit. Slower delivery on off, Akmal heaves it away over midwicket for a huge six. Made a cracking sound off the bat
Elliott to Bravo, no run, slower delivery outside off, cut away to point. No run
Elliott to Bravo, no run, another dot. Full outside off, Bravo steers to short third man
Elliott to Bravo, FOUR, edged for four. Enough of steering and guiding, Bravo looks for an almighty heave and swings too hard. A legcutter takes the outside edge and to the third man boundary
Elliott to Bravo, 1 run, driven to the sweeper cover
Elliott to Umar Akmal, 1 run, another legcutter outside off, driven to long-off
Elliott to Bravo, 1 run, good over. Full on middle, whipped to midwicket for a run
Anwar Ali to Bravo, 1 run, low full toss, looking for that blockhole. Chipped to long-on. Just one
Anwar Ali to Umar Akmal, SIX, smashed. Another full toss, outside off, Umar shuffles across and belts the swipe easily over midwicket. Gigantic six
Anwar Ali to Umar Akmal, SIX, another full toss, another six. Looking for the yorker but Umar swats it away over midwicket. Six more. Poor bowling
Anwar Ali to Umar Akmal, SIX, six more. three in a row for Umar. Short and wide from Anwar. Akml waits for it, knows the location of the fielders and upper cuts over point for six. Great shot.
Anwar Ali to Umar Akmal, 1 run, slower delivery on middle, pushed to long-on for a run. Akmal gets to fifty. Great knock this.
Anwar Ali to Bravo, 1 run, whipped to long-on. Too full for Bravo to get under it
Umar Gul to Bravo, no run, full on off, not quite a yorker. Bravo gives himself room and skews the drive to point. No run.
Umar Gul to Bravo, FOUR, excellent bowling, unlucky for Gul. Superb yorker on leg, Bravo gives himself room and jams it past short third man for four.
Umar Gul to Bravo, 1 run, full toss outside off, drilled to the sweeper cover for a run.
Umar Gul to Umar Akmal, FOUR, excellent shot from Umar. 200 up for Lahore. Full and wide, just inside the tramline. Umar slaps the ball past cover for four. Great timing, four more.
Umar Gul to Umar Akmal, 1 run, ooh, in the arc. Full outside off, Akmal looks to belt the ball too hard but squirts to long-on instead.
Umar Gul to Bravo, no run, short on off, Bravo tries an exotic reverse lap but misses it by a mile. Dot ball to finish.
